modmenu.descriptionTranslation.idle_boos: This mod optimizes performance when Minecraft is running in the background.
options.idle_boost.debugModeToggle.toolt: Enables or disables debug mode for additional output to the console. (Useful for finding or reporting bugs)
options.idle_boost.framerateLimit.toolti: Sets the max framerate when Minecraft is inactive.
Enables or disables whether the max framerate should be limited when Minecraft is inactive.
options.idle_boost.modToggle.tooltip: Enables or disables the Idle Boost features.
options.idle_boost.renderDistance.toolti: Sets the render distance when Minecraft is inactive.
Enables or disables whether the render distance should be limited when Minecraft is inactive.
options.idle_boost.title: Idle Boost Options
